title: Kennel vs. In-Home Boarding: Which is Right for Your Dog?
description: A comprehensive comparison between traditional kennels and boutique in-home boarding to help you make the best choice for your pet's needs.

title: Our Story: Why We Built a Boutique Dog Boarding Haven in Irvine
description: From veterinary technician to founder of Ruh-Roh Retreat, discover Johnny's journey to creating a safe, loving, and boutique home-away-from-home for Irvine's dogs.
